Cave goblins are goblins of the ancient Dorgeshuun tribe found in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves. They are friendly creatures, and are willing to give many adventurers a tinderbox or a lit torch (if the player does not have one) when spoken to. When one of them is attacked, nearby cave goblins will scream certain phrases such as "Nooo!" or "Eeek!" while backing away.
